title: Demotion Bug
body: Demoted, but got code in the alert box instead of proper text.

replies.body:
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

>The removal of Division V from all Ranked Tiers may have caused some players to be unexpectedly demoted. We are continuing to investigate this issue and will provide updates as we have them.

What does that have to do with my issue?

I was 0 LP and lost 2-3 games in a row. Of course I demoted.

The issue is about the code that was visible in my demotion alert box.

My point was they are more than likely related. The demotion/promotion issues are a result of the loss of div 5 and addition of more tiers, which is also more than likely the reason for your faulty popup. Some part of the code hasn't got the memo about the changes.
